name: Coalition Clean Baltic
membership: IUCN, European Seas Environmental Cooperation (ESEC, 4 regional NGO networks joint platform), CCB is a ExCom member of the Baltic Sea fishery Advisory Council(BSAC), CCB is an observer in HELCOM and ICES. CCB regularly participates in meetings with NASCO. CCB holds the Chair in the Jastarnia Group (a WG of ASCOBANS)
goal:
CCB is a network of national NGOs formed to organize cooperation among member organisations, and to via the international office staff represent all Baltic region grass root NGOs in international fora, to follow the development of processes and relevant environmental and marine policies on an EU level and act towards relevant bodies such as HELCOM, BSAC, EU Strategy for the Baltic Sea Region etc.

CCBs aim is to promote a sustainable development and the protection and restoration of the Baltic Sea catchment, the Baltic Sea water status and marine life.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Public Health, Regional Policy
euInitiatives: CFP; MSFD; Habitat Directive; Circular Economy, Blue Growth Initiative; MSP; IED; CAP and water protection policies; WFD and Regional Sea Convention HELCOM; EU eel management plan.
